dict.acceptation: 解释，说明；翻译；表演，演绎；理解；

sent.orig: It is this unwitting interpretation of interpretation that interests de Man.
sent.trans: 正是这个未被意识到的“阐释的阐释”吸引了德曼。

sent.orig: Short-term memory plays a key role in a successful interpretation, which is distinctive in consecutive interpretation.
sent.trans: 短时记忆能力是口译成功的重要因素，这一点在交替传译中尤为明显。

sent.orig: Multi-functional conferences hall employs Philips simultaneous interpretation system that provides English, Japanese, German, French interpretation simultaneously.
sent.trans: 多功能会议厅采用菲利浦同声翻译系统，同时提供英、、、四种语言翻译。

sent.orig: According to the biological interpretation of the genetic algorithm, the corresponding physical interpretation is given.
sent.trans: 相对于遗传算法的生物解释，本文给出了相应的物理解释。

sent.orig: The criminal law judicial interpretation includes the interpretation as text and that as contents.
sent.trans: 刑法司法解释包括作为文本的司法解释和作为内容的司法解释。
